skeleton

Class SkeletonExtraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • skeleton.SkeletonExtraction

  • public class SkeletonExtraction
extends java.lang.Object
    Skeleton extraction algorithm with visible repulsive forece

    Jim Stanev

      • getVDS

        public void getVDS(java.util.Vector<Node> vertices)
        Run the algorithm. For better performance, pool of threads pattern used to divide the work witch can be parallel executed.
        Parameters:
        vertices - the vertices of a model

      • localeMinimum

        private Chain localeMinimum(math.geom3d.Point3D seed)
        Locates the local minimum of a seed point using the vrf(x), termination condition |vrf(x+1)|>|vrf(x)| (not working so iteration inserted).
        Parameters:
        seed - the initial position
